name: HAVE A HEAD
description:
HAVE A HEAD - A game by Csanad Baksa-Soos
Someone murdered this head. Find the culprit. Have a head.

Well, you have no idea who the killer is,  so first listen to all the suspects / witnesses. Finding the right head all depends on how well you interpret what everyone's saying. Get ready to pick one out.  Aim for first try.

-----

my first game ever ::::: all hand-drawn ::::: made for a uni project

Moholy-Nagy University of Art and Design/ MOME media design BA2

2020
